description: Trap based on TFTP client failure to download file from gateway TFTP server.
The Error code message strings are according RFC 1350:
0 Not defined
1 File not found.
2 Access violation.
3 Disk full or allocation exceeded.
4 Illegal TFTP operation.
5 Unknown transfer ID.
6 File already exists.
7 No such user.

event.Summary: TFTP client $v1 failed to download file $v2 from gateway TFTP server: $v3

description: The TFTP client IP address. Default = 0.0.0.0
variables.name: CIG-SERVERS-MIB::cigTftpServersNotificationClientIpAddr

description: The filename that the TFTP client tried to upload/download. Default = ''
variables.name: CIG-SERVERS-MIB::cigTftpServersNotificationFilename

description: The error string relevant to the Error occured during the last upload/download
operation. Default = ''
variables.name: CIG-SERVERS-MIB::cigTftpServersNotificationErrorString

description: Trap based on TFTP client failure to upload file to gateway TFTP server.
The Error code message strings are according RFC 1350:
0 Not defined
1 File not found.
2 Access violation.
3 Disk full or allocation exceeded.
4 Illegal TFTP operation.
5 Unknown transfer ID.
6 File already exists.
7 No such user.
please note that the gateway TFTP server prevents uploading files to the device
using TFTP client, pnly downloading files from the device. The upload files to the
gateway TFTP server is by using LOAD-MIB.

event.Summary: TFTP client $v1 failed to upload file $v2 to gateway TFTP server: $v3

description: The TFTP client IP address. Default = 0.0.0.0
variables.name: CIG-SERVERS-MIB::cigTftpServersNotificationClientIpAddr

description: The filename that the TFTP client tried to upload/download. Default = ''
variables.name: CIG-SERVERS-MIB::cigTftpServersNotificationFilename

description: The error string relevant to the Error occured during the last upload/download
operation. Default = ''
variables.name: CIG-SERVERS-MIB::cigTftpServersNotificationErrorString

description: DHCP IP address conflict detection. This trap is based on:
1. DHCP server send Ping packets before allocating new IP address.
2. The Client Decline Packets after the client sent gratuitous Arp and get response.

event.Summary: DHCP IP $v1 address conflict detected through $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIG-SERVERS-MIB::cigDhcpServersClientConflictDetectionTrap CIG-SERVERS-MIB::cigDhcpServersNotificationIpAddr a 192.0.2.1 CIG-SERVERS-MIB::cigDhcpServersNotificationClientHostName s EXAMPLE CIG-SERVERS-MIB::cigDhcpServersNotificationClientIdentifier s EXAMPLE CIG-SERVERS-MIB::cigDhcpServersNotificationConflictDetectionMethod i 1

description: The relevant allocated IP address in DHCP/Bootp packet. Default = 0.0.0.0
variables.name: CIG-SERVERS-MIB::cigDhcpServersNotificationIpAddr

description: This mib item presents the Client Host name as send by client packet in option 12.
variables.name: CIG-SERVERS-MIB::cigDhcpServersNotificationClientHostName

description: The Client identifier used in the DHCP packet. The strcuture of the client identifier is
as follows: combination of TYPE and Data. Where Type = 01 if for Ethernet MACs and Data for
this case if Ethernet MAC address. Default: 01000000000000
variables.name: CIG-SERVERS-MIB::cigDhcpServersNotificationClientIdentifier

description: The method which the DHCP server detect conflict. Using ping message by DHCP server
or recieving Decline packet from the client as response to client gratuitous ARP.
variables.name: CIG-SERVERS-MIB::cigDhcpServersNotificationConflictDetectionMethod

description: Server refusal to extend lease or for other clients requests.

event.Summary: Server refusal to extend lease or for other clients requests

description: The relevant allocated IP address in DHCP/Bootp packet. Default = 0.0.0.0
variables.name: CIG-SERVERS-MIB::cigDhcpServersNotificationIpAddr

description: The Client identifier used in the DHCP packet. The strcuture of the client identifier is
as follows: combination of TYPE and Data. Where Type = 01 if for Ethernet MACs and Data for
this case if Ethernet MAC address. Default: 01000000000000
variables.name: CIG-SERVERS-MIB::cigDhcpServersNotificationClientIdentifier

description: Notification for no IP address left for specific network.

event.Summary: No IP address left for specific network $v2

description: The Client identifier used in the DHCP packet. The strcuture of the client identifier is
as follows: combination of TYPE and Data. Where Type = 01 if for Ethernet MACs and Data for
this case if Ethernet MAC address. Default: 01000000000000
variables.name: CIG-SERVERS-MIB::cigDhcpServersNotificationClientIdentifier

description: This mib item presents cases where no IP address left for specific network.
The network exhausted is the pool start/stop IP address AND subnet mask
variables.name: CIG-SERVERS-MIB::cigDhcpServersNotificationPoolNetwork
